Class MainActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      com.gleaserver.aps.MainActivity

public class MainActivity
extends Activity

Main Activity

Version:
1.0 This class is intended to be the "Front End" for the Android Phone Server It is what Starts and stops the Service that manages everything. This class handles the GUI and the User Interface.
Author:
aGleason
